code: import axios from"axios";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import logger from"./logService";axios.interceptors.response.use(null,function(error){var expectedError=error.response&&error.response.status>=400&&error.response.status<500;if(!expectedError){toast.error("An unexpected error occured");}logger.log(error);return Promise.reject(error);});function setJwt(jwt){axios.defaults.headers.common["x-auth-token"]=jwt;}export default{get:axios.get,post:axios.post,put:axios.put,delete:axios.delete,patch:axios.patch,setJwt:setJwt};
